programme.title: 30 Nights of Sex
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to save their marriage, Nick and Willa visit a renowned, yet eccentric, couples therapist and embark on a month-long journey of provocative and hilarious sex assignments. Starring Dan Fogler, Johnny Giacalone, Mandy Kaplan

programme.title: 6 Degrees of Hell
programme.desc: Six individuals are caught up in a supernatural perfect storm, as an evil lays claim to one of them while threatening to tear apart the soul of a small Pennsylvania town. Starring Corey Feldman, Brian Anthony Wilson and Nicole Cinaglia

programme.title: A Crack in the Floor
programme.desc: When his self-imposed exile from society is interrupted by a group of friends on a hiking trip, a murderous hermit terrorizes the visitors. Starring Mario Lopez, Gary Busey, Bo Hopkins

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: An upstate South Carolina family seek the help of two paranormal investigators, Connor Biddle and India Hopwood, to capture evidence of the strange phenomena taking place inside their historical home.

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: An upstate South Carolina family seek the help of two paranormal investigators, Connor Biddle and India Hopwood, to capture evidence of the strange phenomena taking place inside their historical home.

programme.title: A Place to Live
programme.desc: A Place to Live follows the journey of seven LGBTQ seniors as they attempt to secure an apartment in Triangle Square, the nation's first affordable housing facility for LGBTQ seniors in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Accidental Blessing
programme.desc: Beatriz, a failed psychologist, flees to her childhood home to escape fraud charges, only to discover that her quirky aunt has turned the estate into a high school. What seems at first a terrible surprise will in fact help her finally find a fulfilling path in life as an unconventional theater instructor.

programme.title: Adventures of Power
programme.desc: In his quest to become the world's greatest air-drummer, a small-town dreamer must overcome obstacles and ridicule to save the day. Starring Ari Gold, Michael McKean, Jane Lynch
